definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In eccentric type of IV enlargement, the LVMI was increased.
sentences.chinese: 左室離心性擴張型的左室重量指數增加。

sentences.english: She had a cultivated mind, and was, generally speaking, rational and consistent;
sentences.chinese: 她心性嫺雅，一般說來也很明智，堅定。

sentences.english: He was of a delicate mind and body, and he died at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 他心性敏感而體質柔弱，很早就過世了。

sentences.english: Love to eat meat, people who have central obesity to be careful rectal cancer.
sentences.chinese: 愛喫肉，又有向心性肥胖的人要小心直腸癌。

sentences.english: I have noticed specific mentalities of different nations.
sentences.chinese: 我也注意到不同的國家有著特有的心性。

sentences.english: Chen Wei's mind and works are quiet and remote.
sentences.chinese: 陳蔚的心性和作品安靜而悠遠。

sentences.english: The mind, sharp but not broad, sticks at every point but does not move.
sentences.chinese: 那些尖銳而不廣博的心性，執泥而一無所成。

sentences.english: I realized that I hadn't been improving my Xinxing as the tribulations came like before.
sentences.chinese: 我意識到，當磨難來的時候，我沒有提高自己的心性。

sentences.english: The intermingling of the theory of mind and nature in Daoism and Buddhism is a big problem in the history of Chinese thought.
sentences.chinese: 道佛心性論的互動是中國思想史的重大問題。

sentences.english: But Xue Pan was as fickle as water-weed which drifts EAST today, west tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 偏那薛蟠本是浮萍心性，今日愛東，明日愛西。

sentences.english: Moderate mitral regurgitation was more common in eccentric left ventricular hypertrophy group.
sentences.chinese: 離心性肥厚組中度二尖瓣反流者較多。

sentences.english: She has a strong character and will not be defeated by any difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 她一向心性堅強，任何困難都打不倒他。

sentences.english: One could say that Wang Jinsong's ink painting is a reflection of his love of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，王勁松的水墨畫是他自由心性的寫照。

sentences.english: A girl had a far-reaching aspiration, and she will go farther now, four boys went to see her off.
sentences.chinese: 一位心性高遠的女孩要遠走高飛了，四個男孩去送她。

sentences.english: He was learning the centrality of preparation — and organisation — to making political change.
sentences.chinese: 他正在學習製造政治變化所需的準備與組織的向心性。

sentences.english: I shall now attempt to read the mind of someone in the audience.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我要用讀心性來猜一名觀衆的心思了。

definition: to devote oneself to spiritual development (esp. Buddhism or Daoism)/to devote oneself to perfecting one's art or craft
